languages.text: Параметр, помогающий свести на нет {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от ближних и дистанционных атак. Если персонаж атакован, он автоматически попробует уклониться от атаки — неважно, каким именно оружием его атаковали. Базовый шанс уклонения равен (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} цели − {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижение уклонения{/g} атакующего)%. Общий шанс уклонения может меняться под действием {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} и эффектов, дающих {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} или штрафы к уклонению цели либо снижению уклонения атакующего. Для дистанционных атак базовое значение снижения уклонения равно значению {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятия{/g} атакующего. Для атак в ближнем бою при расчете снижения уклонения к Восприятию добавляется половина значения Ловкости. Чтобы уклониться от атаки из дистанционного оружия по области, персонаж должен покинуть зону поражения, но при этом он может переместиться максимум на три клетки. Если он сумеет покинуть зону поражения, уклонение будет успешным, а если нет, то персонаж автоматически получит урон от {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} по касательной.
languages.original_text: A parameter that helps negate {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks. If the character is attacked, they will automatically try to dodge the attack — no matter the weapon. Base dodge chance is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and effects that grant {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. For ranged attacks, base dodge reduction is equal to the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} score. For melee attacks, base dodge reduction is increased by half of the attacker's Agility score. When dodging an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} made by a ranged weapon, the character can only move up to three cells in order to leave the affected area — only in this case can a dodge be successful. If for some reason the character is unable to leave the affected area, they automatically take grazing {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} damage.

traits.locale_text: Параметр, помогающий свести на нет урон от ближних и дальних атак. Если персонаж атакован, он автоматически попробует уклониться от атаки — неважно, каким именно оружием его атаковали. Базовый шанс уклонения равен (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} цели − {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} противника)%. Этот шанс может меняться под действием способностей и эффектов, влияющих на шанс уклонения, а также в зависимости от параметра {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}cнижение уклонения{/g} атакующего персонажа. Базовое значение этого параметра складывается из значения Восприятия атакующего, а также половины значения Ловкости (если персонаж использует рукопашное оружие). Чтобы уклониться от {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacks}атаки из оружия дальнего боя по области{/g}, персонаж должен покинуть зону поражения, но при этом он может переместиться максимум на три клетки. Если он сумеет покинуть зону поражения, уклонение будет успешным, а если нет, то персонаж автоматически получит урон от {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}попадания по касательной{/g}.

Параметр, помогающий свести на нет урон от ближних и дальних атак. Если персонаж атакован, он автоматически попробует уклониться от атаки — неважно, каким именно оружием его атаковали. Базовый шанс уклонения равен (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} цели − {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} противника)%. Этот шанс может меняться под действием способностей и эффектов, влияющих на шанс уклонения, а также в зависимости от параметра {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}cнижение уклонения{/g} атакующего персонажа. Базовое значение этого параметра складывается из значения Восприятия атакующего, а также половины значения Ловкости (если персонаж использует рукопашное оружие). Чтобы уклониться от {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacks}атаки из оружия дальнего боя по области{/g}, персонаж должен покинуть зону поражения, но при этом он может переместиться максимум на три клетки. Если он сумеет покинуть зону поражения, уклонение будет успешным, а если нет, то персонаж автоматически получит урон от {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}попадания по касательной{/g}.

languages.text: A parameter that helps negate {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks. If the character is attacked, they will automatically try to dodge the attack — no matter the weapon. Base dodge chance is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and effects that grant {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. For ranged attacks, base dodge reduction is equal to the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} score. For melee attacks, base dodge reduction is increased by half of the attacker's Agility score. When dodging an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} made by a ranged weapon, the character can only move up to three cells in order to leave the affected area — only in this case can a dodge be successful. If for some reason the character is unable to leave the affected area, they automatically take grazing {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} damage.
languages.original_text: Параметр, помогающий свести на нет {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от ближних и дистанционных атак. Если персонаж атакован, он автоматически попробует уклониться от атаки — неважно, каким именно оружием его атаковали. Базовый шанс уклонения равен (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} цели − {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижение уклонения{/g} атакующего)%. Общий шанс уклонения может меняться под действием {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} и эффектов, дающих {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} или штрафы к уклонению цели либо снижению уклонения атакующего. Для дистанционных атак базовое значение снижения уклонения равно значению {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятия{/g} атакующего. Для атак в ближнем бою при расчете снижения уклонения к Восприятию добавляется половина значения Ловкости. Чтобы уклониться от атаки из дистанционного оружия по области, персонаж должен покинуть зону поражения, но при этом он может переместиться максимум на три клетки. Если он сумеет покинуть зону поражения, уклонение будет успешным, а если нет, то персонаж автоматически получит урон от {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} по касательной.

traits.locale_text: A skill that helps negate damage from melee and ranged attacks. If the character is attacked, they will automatically try to dodge the attack — no matter the weapon. Base dodge chance is (30 + target {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g})%. This chance can also be affected by abilities and effects that influence dodge chance and will depend on the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. The base value of this stat is the sum of the attacker's Perception and half of their Agility score (if the character uses a melee weapon). When dodging an {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacks}area attack made by a ranged weapon{/g}, the character can only move up to three cells in order to leave the affected area — only in this case can a dodge be successful. If for some reason the character is unable to leave the affected area, they automatically take {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}grazing hit{/g} damage.

A skill that helps negate damage from melee and ranged attacks. If the character is attacked, they will automatically try to dodge the attack — no matter the weapon. Base dodge chance is (30 + target {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g})%. This chance can also be affected by abilities and effects that influence dodge chance and will depend on the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. The base value of this stat is the sum of the attacker's Perception and half of their Agility score (if the character uses a melee weapon). When dodging an {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacks}area attack made by a ranged weapon{/g}, the character can only move up to three cells in order to leave the affected area — only in this case can a dodge be successful. If for some reason the character is unable to leave the affected area, they automatically take {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}grazing hit{/g} damage.

A parameter that helps negate {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks. If the character is attacked, they will automatically try to dodge the attack — no matter the weapon. Base dodge chance is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and effects that grant {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. For ranged attacks, base dodge reduction is equal to the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} score. For melee attacks, base dodge reduction is increased by half of the attacker's Agility score. When dodging an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} made by a ranged weapon, the character can only move up to three cells in order to leave the affected area — only in this case can a dodge be successful. If for some reason the character is unable to leave the affected area, they automatically take grazing {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} damage.

languages.text: Ein Parameter, der bei der Negierung von {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schäden{/g} aus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nah-{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriffen{/g} hilft. Wenn der Charakter angegriffen wird, versucht er automatisch, dem Angriff auszuweichen — ungeachtet der benutzten Waffe. Die Grund-Ausweichen-Chance beträgt (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} des Ziels − {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} des Angreifers)%. Die Gesamt-Ausweichchance kann durch {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} Fähigkeiten und Effekte modifiziert werden, die einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} bzw. Malus auf das Ausweichen des Ziels bzw. die Ausweichen-Reduktion des Angreifers mit sich bringen. Bei Fernkampfangriffen entspricht der Grundwert der Ausweichen-Reduktion der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} des Angreifers. Bei Nahkampfangriffen wird der Grundwert der Ausweichen-Reduktion um die Hälfte des Beweglichkeitswerts des Angreifers erhöht. Wenn ein Charakter einem {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} ausweicht, der von einer Fernkampfwaffe ausgeführt wurde, kann er sich nur bis zu drei Felder bewegen, um das betroffene Gebiet zu verlassen — ein Ausweichen kann nur in diesem Fall erfolgreich sein. Wenn der Charakter das betroffene Gebiet aus irgendeinem Grund nicht verlassen kann, erleidet er automatisch {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Streifschuss{/g}-Schaden.
languages.original_text: A parameter that helps negate {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks. If the character is attacked, they will automatically try to dodge the attack — no matter the weapon. Base dodge chance is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and effects that grant {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. For ranged attacks, base dodge reduction is equal to the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} score. For melee attacks, base dodge reduction is increased by half of the attacker's Agility score. When dodging an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} made by a ranged weapon, the character can only move up to three cells in order to leave the affected area — only in this case can a dodge be successful. If for some reason the character is unable to leave the affected area, they automatically take grazing {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} damage.

traits.locale_text: Ein Parameter, der bei der Negierung von Schäden aus Nah- und {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriffen{/g} hilft. Wenn der Charakter angegriffen wird, versucht er automatisch, dem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}auszuweichen{/g} — ungeachtet der benutzten Waffe. Die Grund-Ausweichen-Chance beträgt (30 + Zielt-{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} − Angreifer-{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}) %. Diese Chance kann auch von {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} und Effekten verändert werden, die die Ausweichen-Chance beeinflussen und hängt von der {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} des Angreifers ab. Der Grundwert dieser Statistik ist die Summe der Wahrnehmung des Angreifers und der Hälfte seines Beweglichkeitswerts (falls der Charakter eine Nahkampfwaffe einsetzt). Wenn der Charakter einem {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} ausweicht, der von einer Fernkampfwaffe ausgeführt wurde, kann er sich nur bis zu drei Felder bewegen, um das betroffene Gebiet zu verlassen — ein Ausweichen kann nur in diesem Fall erfolgreich sein. Wenn der Charakter das betroffene Gebiet aus irgendeinem Grund nicht verlassen kann, erleidet er automatisch {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}Streifschuss{/g}-Schaden.

Ein Parameter, der bei der Negierung von {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schäden{/g} aus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nah-{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriffen{/g} hilft. Wenn der Charakter angegriffen wird, versucht er automatisch, dem Angriff auszuweichen — ungeachtet der benutzten Waffe. Die Grund-Ausweichen-Chance beträgt (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} des Ziels — {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} des Angreifers)%. Die Gesamt-Ausweichchance kann durch {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} Fähigkeiten und Effekte modifiziert werden, die einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} bzw. Malus auf das Ausweichen des Ziels bzw. die Ausweichen-Reduktion des Angreifers mit sich bringen. Bei Fernkampfangriffen entspricht der Grundwert der Ausweichen-Reduktion der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} des Angreifers. Bei Nahkampfangriffen wird der Grundwert der Ausweichen-Reduktion um die Hälfte des Beweglichkeitswerts des Angreifers erhöht. Wenn ein Charakter einem {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} ausweicht, der von einer Fernkampfwaffe ausgeführt wurde, kann er sich nur bis zu drei Felder bewegen, um das betroffene Gebiet zu verlassen — ein Ausweichen kann nur in diesem Fall erfolgreich sein. Wenn der Charakter das betroffene Gebiet aus irgendeinem Grund nicht verlassen kann, erleidet er automatisch {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Streifschuss{/g}-Schaden.

languages.text: Paramètre qui permet d'annuler les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} des attaques de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}. Si le personnage est la cible d'une attaque, il tente automatiquement de l'esquiver, quelle que soit l'arme employée. Les chances d'esquive de base sont de (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de la cible − {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Réduction d'esquive{/g}) %. Les chances d'esquive totales peuvent également être modifiées par des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} et des effets appliquant des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} ou des pénalités à l'Esquive de la cible ou à la Réduction d'esquive de l'attaquant. Pour les attaques à distance, la Réduction d'esquive de base est égale au score de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de l'attaquant. Pour les attaques de mêlée, la Réduction d'esquive de base est augmentée de la moitié du score d'Agilité de l'attaquant. Lorsqu'il esquive une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} lancée avec une arme à distance, le personnage ne peut se déplacer que de 3 cases au maximum pour quitter la zone d'effet (sinon son esquive échoue). Si, pour une raison quelconque, il ne peut pas quitter la zone d'effet, il subit automatiquement des dégâts de type {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} de griffe.
languages.original_text: A parameter that helps negate {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks. If the character is attacked, they will automatically try to dodge the attack — no matter the weapon. Base dodge chance is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and effects that grant {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. For ranged attacks, base dodge reduction is equal to the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} score. For melee attacks, base dodge reduction is increased by half of the attacker's Agility score. When dodging an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} made by a ranged weapon, the character can only move up to three cells in order to leave the affected area — only in this case can a dodge be successful. If for some reason the character is unable to leave the affected area, they automatically take grazing {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} damage.

traits.locale_text: Paramètre qui permet d'annuler les dégâts infligés par les attaques de mêlée et les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}. Si le personnage est la cible d'une attaque, il tente automatiquement de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiver{/g}, quelle que soit l'arme employée. Les chances d'esquive de base sont de (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de la cible - {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de l'attaquant) %. Ces chances varient également en fonction des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} utilisées et des effets appliqués, ainsi que de la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} de l'attaquant. La valeur de base de cette caractéristique est égale à la somme de la Perception de l'attaquant et de la moitié de son score d'Agilité (si le personnage utilise une arme de mêlée). Lorsqu'il esquive une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} lancée à l'aide d'une arme à distance, le personnage ne peut se déplacer que de trois cases pour quitter la zone d'effet (sinon son esquive échoue). Si, pour une raison quelconque, il ne peut pas quitter la zone d'effet, il subit automatiquement des dégâts de type {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}coup de griffe{/g}.

Paramètre qui permet d'annuler les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} des attaques de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}. Si le personnage est la cible d'une attaque, il tente automatiquement de l'esquiver, quelle que soit l'arme employée. Les chances d'esquive de base sont de (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de la cible - {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Réduction d'esquive{/g}) %. Les chances d'esquive totales peuvent également être modifiées par des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} et des effets appliquant des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} ou des pénalités à l'Esquive de la cible ou à la Réduction d'esquive de l'attaquant. Pour les attaques à distance, la Réduction d'esquive de base est égale au score de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de l'attaquant. Pour les attaques de mêlée, la Réduction d'esquive de base est augmentée de la moitié du score d'Agilité de l'attaquant. Lorsqu'il esquive une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} lancée avec une arme à distance, le personnage ne peut se déplacer que de 3 cases au maximum pour quitter la zone d'effet (sinon son esquive échoue). Si, pour une raison quelconque, il ne peut pas quitter la zone d'effet, il subit automatiquement des dégâts de type {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} de griffe.

languages.text: 这个属性可以抵消{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。 当角色角色受到攻击，无论受到的是什么武器的攻击，该角色都会自动尝试闪避攻击。基础闪避率为（30+目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}-攻击者{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}）%。目标的闪避率与攻击者的闪避减免还会受其他{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}或效果增减，继而进一步影响最终闪避率。近战攻击与远程攻击闪避减免的计算方式不同，远程攻击的闪避减免等于攻击者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}，而近战攻击的闪避减免更高，会再额外增加攻击者敏捷的一半。 当角色闪避远程武器的{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}时，角色可以试图移动最多3格，尝试离开受影响的区域。受到范围武器攻击时，只有离开受影响的区域，才能成功闪避。如果角色出于某种原因无法离开受影响的区域，则会自动受到流弹攻击伤害。
languages.original_text: A parameter that helps negate {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks. If the character is attacked, they will automatically try to dodge the attack — no matter the weapon. Base dodge chance is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and effects that grant {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. For ranged attacks, base dodge reduction is equal to the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} score. For melee attacks, base dodge reduction is increased by half of the attacker's Agility score. When dodging an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} made by a ranged weapon, the character can only move up to three cells in order to leave the affected area — only in this case can a dodge be successful. If for some reason the character is unable to leave the affected area, they automatically take grazing {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} damage.

traits.locale_text: 这个属性可以抵消{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。 当角色角色受到攻击，无论受到的是什么武器的攻击，该角色都会自动尝试闪避攻击。基础闪避率为（30+目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}-攻击者{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}）%。目标的闪避率与攻击者的闪避减免还会受其他{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}或效果增减，继而进一步影响最终闪避率。近战攻击与远程攻击闪避减免的计算方式不同，远程攻击的闪避减免等于攻击者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}，而近战攻击的闪避减免更高，会再额外增加攻击者敏捷的一半。 当角色闪避远程武器的{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}时，角色可以试图移动最多3格，尝试离开受影响的区域。受到范围武器攻击时，只有离开受影响的区域，才能成功闪避。如果角色出于某种原因无法离开受影响的区域，则会自动受到流弹攻击伤害。

languages.original_text: A parameter that helps negate damage from melee and ranged attacks. If the character is attacked, they will automatically try to dodge the attack — no matter the weapon. Base dodge chance is (30 + target {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g})%. This chance can also be affected by abilities and effects that influence dodge chance and will depend on the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. The base value of this stat is the sum of the attacker's Perception and half of their Agility score (if the character uses a melee weapon). When dodging an {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacks}area attack made by a ranged weapon{/g}, the character can only move up to three cells in order to leave the affected area — only in this case can a dodge be successful. If for some reason the character is unable to leave the affected area, they automatically take {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}grazing hit{/g} damage.

languages.text: Un parámetro que ayuda a negar el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de los ataques {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g}. Si el personaje recibe un ataque, intentará esquivarlo automáticamente, sin importar el arma del que proceda. La probabilidad de esquiva básica es de un (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} del objetivo − {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} del atacante) %. La probabilidad total de esquiva puede verse alterada por {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} y efectos que aplican {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} o penalizaciones a la esquiva del objetivo o a la reducción de esquiva del atacante. Para ataques a distancia, la reducción de esquiva básica es igual a la puntuación de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} del atacante. Para ataques cuerpo a cuerpo, la reducción de esquiva básica aumenta en la mitad de la puntuación de Agilidad del atacante. Al esquivar un {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} proveniente de un arma a distancia, el personaje solo puede moverse hasta tres casillas para abandonar la zona afectada, y solo esquiva el {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} si lo consigue. Si el personaje no puede abandonar la zona afectada, recibe automáticamente daño de rasguño.
languages.original_text: A parameter that helps negate {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks. If the character is attacked, they will automatically try to dodge the attack — no matter the weapon. Base dodge chance is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and effects that grant {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. For ranged attacks, base dodge reduction is equal to the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} score. For melee attacks, base dodge reduction is increased by half of the attacker's Agility score. When dodging an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} made by a ranged weapon, the character can only move up to three cells in order to leave the affected area — only in this case can a dodge be successful. If for some reason the character is unable to leave the affected area, they automatically take grazing {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} damage.

traits.locale_text: Un parámetro que ayuda a negar el daño de los ataques cuerpo a cuerpo y {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g}. Si el personaje recibe un ataque, intentará {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquivarlo{/g} automáticamente, sin importar el arma del que proceda. La probabilidad de esquiva base es (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} del objetivo − {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} del atacante) %. Esta probabilidad también se ve afectada por {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} y efectos que influyen en la esquiva, así como por la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} del atacante. El valor base de esta estadística es la suma de la Percepción del atacante y la mitad de su Agilidad (siempre que use un arma cuerpo a cuerpo). Al esquivar un {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} proveniente de un arma a distancia, el personaje solo puede moverse hasta tres casillas para abandonar la zona afectada, y solo lo esquiva si lo consigue. Si el personaje no puede abandonar la zona afectada, recibe automáticamente daño de {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}rasguño{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}攻撃および{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}攻撃からの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を無効化するのに役立つパラメータ。 キャラクターが攻撃を受けると、武器が何であるかにかかわらず自動的に攻撃を回避しようとする。基本の回避率は(30＋ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}−アタッカーの{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g})%。合計回避率はさらに{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を与える{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}や効果、およびターゲットの回避ペナルティやアタッカーの回避減少の影響も受ける。遠距離攻撃に対する基本の回避減少は、アタッカーの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}に等しい。近接攻撃に対する基本の回避減少は、アタッカーの敏捷性の半分増加する。 遠距離武器による{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}を回避する場合、キャラクターが攻撃対象エリアから退避する際に移動できるのは最大3セルであり、この場合にのみ回避は成功となる。キャラクターが何かしらの理由で攻撃対象エリアから退避できない場合、自動的に擦過{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}ダメージを受ける。
languages.original_text: A parameter that helps negate {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks. If the character is attacked, they will automatically try to dodge the attack — no matter the weapon. Base dodge chance is (30 + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} − attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g})%. Total dodge chance can be further affected by {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and effects that grant {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} or penalties to the target's dodge or the attacker's dodge reduction. For ranged attacks, base dodge reduction is equal to the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} score. For melee attacks, base dodge reduction is increased by half of the attacker's Agility score. When dodging an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} made by a ranged weapon, the character can only move up to three cells in order to leave the affected area — only in this case can a dodge be successful. If for some reason the character is unable to leave the affected area, they automatically take grazing {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} damage.
